page.title: 10ATTITUDES
page.content: An important area in Sheffield is Bramall Lane football ground. Football is extremely popular in Sheffield. Usually there is no trouble but occasionally disturbances occur, which damage the area. Our city also boasts one of the best art centres outside London. Leadmill is an old stable. Here you can find rock groups, fringe theatre, jazz, dance and art workshops. We asked 50 people for their opinion about behaviour at football matches. 27% said that players' behaviour contributed to the hooliganism, but 55% said not. 95%, of the people asked,felt that alcohol should not be sold at matches.55% felt that membership cards were a good idea,33% disagreed,11% did not know.
